title: WHY CAN\'T THE CITY NOT ENFORCE THE 25 MPH SPEED ZONE IN NEIGHBORS SINCE THEY WENT TO THE EXPENSE OF THE SIGNS AND MINI-ROUNDABOUTS?
text:
From
what our police reporter tells us, the do often monitor neighborhood
speeds. But yYour question depends on which neighborhood you are
referring to. For this specific complaint, your best option is
contacting the police department and inquiring about their monitoring
of that neighborhood. Thanks for using MyReporter.com
